casebody.data:
DEPT. OF TRANSPORTATION
v.
ROYMAC. No. 375PA03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 5, 2004. W. Richard Moore, Special Deputy Attorney General, Elizabeth N. Strickland, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Prior report: 158 N.C.App. 403 , 581 S.E.2d 770 .

The following order has been entered on the joint motion filed on the 19th day of December 2003 to Withdraw Petition for Discretionary Review and Dismiss Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of February 2004."
